record.text: We had paid for our reservation using WhereToSleep.com, but used a different credit card when checking in to the Bedbug Inn hotel. After we received our statements, we realized that we had been charged twice for the stay, once by wheretosleep.com on one card and once by the hotel when we checked out and we are not getting our money back. The hotel claims they never received payment from the online site, and we have been unable to resolve this with WhereToSleep.com despite multiple telephone calls to their customer service.
